column5: Its on now... Pretty cool show...  Check it out
i watched it and it wasnt as good as i thought it'd be. and i was also hoping there would be sault stuff but no southern michigan and thunderbay. i'll keep watching it might get better.

I agree, not as good as I expected. I was hoping the show was going to have a little more then just tugs and barges in Michigan. Would be nice to see some footage from the canal pilots or fishing tugs in Erie, even some of the construction project out in the lakes. See how it goes, for now Im still watching.
I can't find the history channel on my Zenith.  Do I need cable, satellite or that Internet thingy?? World wide web maybe
I thought it was good....  And I imagine over time they'll show different aspects of the GLs
